files.help:
Supported since 1.5.0. Can be moved to "$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/isyncrc"

Older versions can alias mbsync to use a custom configuration file location:

```bash
alias mbsync=mbsync -c "$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/isync/mbsyncrc
```
If you are using mutt-wizard export the following environment variable:

```bash
export MBSYNCRC="$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/isync/mbsyncrc
```
